General.Name: British American Tobacco Malaysia Bhd
General.Description: British American Tobacco (Malaysia) Berhad manufactures, imports, markets, and sells cigarettes, pipe tobaccos, cigars, devices, and other tobacco and nicotine products primarily in Malaysia. The company markets its products under the Dunhill, Peter Stuyvesant, Rothmans, KYO, Benson & Hedges, Lucky Strike, and glo brand names. British American Tobacco (Malaysia) Berhad was founded in 1912 and is headquartered in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. British American Tobacco (Malaysia) Berhad operates as a British American Tobacco Holdings Malaysia B V.
